response.overview: The Kreator: Gods of Violence Blu-ray is typically found in the limited edition digibook or box set, bundled alongside the CD album. The primary content of the Blu-ray is the band's full live performance from Wacken Open Air 2014.  Blu-ray Tracklist (Live at Wacken 2014)  The live recording features 14 tracks:  Mars Mantra (Intro),  Phantom Antichrist,  From Flood into Fire,  Warcurse,  Endless Pain,  Pleasure to Kill,  Hordes of Chaos,  Phobia,  Enemy of God,  Civilization Collapse,  The Patriarch (Intro),  Violent Revolution,  United in Hate,  Flag of Hate / Tormentor (Medley)
response.title: Kreator - Gods Of Violence
